_header: Is this a fair avaunt is this honor
_description: An extract from Thomas Hoccleve’s Lespistre de Cupide (1092), comprising lines 64-77

BLAdd17492.First Lines:
ys thys afayre avaunte ys thys honora man hymselfe accuse thus and
                    diffame…
BLAdd17492.Last Lines:
…and vnto her thanke perpetuelthat in suche a nede helps can
                    so well
